paper.title: A Hybrid Multi-objective Programming based System Portfolio Selection by SoSCR
paper.abstract: With military requirements, practitioners often face weapon system portfolio selection problems at the equipment R&D stage. Recently, the system of SoS contribution rate (SoSCR) always serves as one of the critical criteria to evaluate the role of a system, facilitating with the weapon system portfolio selection. In this paper, we establish a SoSCR value evaluation model considering two aspects of static capability contribution rate and dynamic connectivity contribution rate, which provide a more comprehensive estimate. Then, based on the value evaluation model, the classification optimization selection strategy is used to obtain the optimal system portfolio. Finally, an illustrative example is presented to verify the feasibility of the proposed model.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究武器系统组合选择问题，涉及静态能力贡献率和动态连接贡献率的评估模型，属于军事装备研发领域，与金融研究领域无关。
